Name: Round Up
Description: Deal 1 damage to two different enemies.

Name: Interrogate
Description:
Subdue an enemy.
Draw a card.

Name: Enforce
Description: Deal 2 damage. Deal 4 damage instead if it is dealt to a subdued enemy.

Name: Eavesdrop
Description:
If there are two or more enemies on the field, forage.
Subdue each enemy.
